submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        change = [0]*(k+2)
        for i in range(n//2):
            x, y = nums[i], nums[n-1-i]
            x, y = min(x,y), max(x,y)
            d = y-x
            mx = max(k-x,y)
            change[0] += 1
            change[mx+1] += 1
            change[d] -= 1
            change[d+1] += 1
        ans = inf 
        cur = 0
        for c in range(k+1):
            cur += change[c]
            ans = min(ans,cur)
        return ans
